trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Nottingham
There were no other sightings in Nottingham on or around September 9th 2009
divs: Sighting DetailsI was sitting in my back garden last night for some fresh air. Now I have seen strange glowing lights before out in my garden so because my girlfriend was out thought id sit outside for a bit. After about 20mins or so I saw 4 red lights in a square formation moving quite quickly in the distance. they went out of view so i ran through my house to the front and onto the street and saw one of them move away fromt he formation and move quickly in another dorection while the remaining 3 lights vanished into the distance. I was amazed with this sitting because it was such a clear night and the way they throbbed was amazing! To be honest, im getting kinda used to seeing these things. Me and my girlfriend have witnessed them 3 times this year, including 2 orange lights dancing around each other. I tried to take video (which is why i know the exact time of the event) but you cant see anything. All you see is me running through the house going "OMG!" lol. An amazing sighting I thought I should report to see if any one can shed any light on it. thanks
Summary: red throbing lights in square formation
